titles.title: The "SEE DANTE Model" for resource management in educational area

descriptions.description: IDIMT-2022 Digitalization of society, business and management in a pandemic; 30th Interdisciplinary Information Management Talk / Chroust, Gerhard ; Doucek, Petr ; Oškrdal, Václav, page 93-100

DANTE – an international project and its first results are presented by this paper. The project is dedicated to develop guidelines for higher education institutions how to develop and run digital courses as a reaction to situation caused by hygienic restrictions during the coronavirus pandemic. Major changes have been realized at and since that time, so educational institutions should be better prepared for similar situations in the future. Be more flexible and adaptable – this approach to IT assets management in education is described. It is based on the identification of the most important elements in educational capability and their inter-relations. Knowledge of the internal structure of the organization supports key stakeholders in a better understanding of the possibilities and limits of organization. In this way, decision-making and long-term planning can be improved.
